price: ¿Acaso no reflexionan [los que niegan la verdad] en la maravillosa creación del camello?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
